entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
